title: Dairy-Free Golden Milk Latte
directions: Combine the Coconutmilk Creamer, coconut oil, turmeric, and black pepper in a saucepan and gently heat through.
Sweeten to taste with agave or maple syrup.
To make the latte, add the Golden Coconutmilk Creamer to hot coffee, or espresso Americano to taste.
Foam the coffee mixture with a steam or hand wand.
ingredients: 2 cups So Delicious Dairy Free Original Coconutmilk Creamer
Agave nectar or maple syrup, to taste
1 tablespoon Golden Coconutmilk Cream, or to taste (above)
